name: Sparrowball
description:
THIS GAME REQUIERES a FRIEND, CONTROLLER and a KEYBOARD TO PLAY. 

Sparrowball is a two player game, where each player plays as a mouse riding a sparrow in a foggy forest. The goal of the game is to capture the shinning rings or steal those that are capturer by your opponent. You score the rings by touching the flying ball.  For each ring you control when touching the ball you get one point. Good luck. 

Controls:

Player red: Left/Right paddle on joystick.

Player blue:  Wings: W / S / A / D  Speed - Up / Down.
